<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
  $(".fold").prepend("<button class=\"fold-btn\">read more</button>");
  $(".fold").children("code").toggle();
  $(".fold-btn").on("click", function() {
    if($(this).text() === "hide") {
      $(this).text("read more");
    } else {
      $(this).text("hide");
    }
    $(this).next("code").toggle("linear");
  })
});
</script>

## Publications

```{r pubz}

citez <- 
  fread("citations.csv"
        )[, Publication :=
            paste0('<a href="',
                   DOI,
                   '" target="_blank">',
                   Publication,
                   '</a>')
        ][, Authors :=
            str_replace_all(
          Authors,
          "((?:DuPai|DuBois), Cory D)",
          "<b>\\1</b>")]

datatable(citez[,c("Publication",
                    "Journal",
                   "Authors",
                    "Date")],
          escape = FALSE,
              rownames = FALSE,
              filter = 'top', 
          extensions = 'Buttons',
              options = list(
                autoWidth = TRUE,
                ordering = TRUE,
                autoWidth = TRUE,
                columnDefs = 
                  list(
                    list(
                      width = '50px', 
                      targets = list(1,3))),
                dom = 'ftB',
                buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel')
                )
              )
```
